We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales &amp; Operations Executive

Job Location:&nbsp;Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role


	The Sales &amp; Operations executive provides administrative, analytical, and operational support to the sales and operations department.
	This role is essential in driving sales e?ciency, managing business operations, project management, ensuring smooth order processing, supporting customer engagement, customer service, vendor management and contributing to business growth through data analysis and&nbsp;cross-functional collaboration.

	Identifying potential leads, researching prospects, and assisting with lead generation activities.
	Assist with the preparation and delivery of sales presentations, proposals, and contracts.
	Collaborate with the operations team to ensure e?cient order processing by sending quotes/invoices and fulfillment of customer orders.
	Help analyze sales data and market trends to identify opportunities for business growth and improvement.
	Provide administrative support, including maintaining sales and customer databases, organizing documents, and scheduling meetings.
	Assist in the development and implementation of sales and marketing strategies to promote our products or services.
	Support customer inquiries and provide exceptional customer service through various communication channels.
	Work closely with cross-functional teams to streamline processes and improve overall operational e?ciency.
	Participate in team meetings, training sessions, and other company events to enhance your professional development and understanding of our business operations
	Manage vendor/partner relationships.
	Undertake ad-hoc projects and assignments as assigned.

	Candidates should possess a Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Information Systems, or a related field with 2-3 years experience.
	Prior experience in a sales support, operations, CRM, or customer success role is an advantage.
	Familiarity with Zoho applications and Pricing such as Zoho CRM, Zoho Books, or Zoho Campaigns is highly desirable.
	Strong understanding of CRM processes, sales pipelines, and customer lifecycle management.
	Ability to generate, update, and manage leads, contacts, deals, and reports within Zoho CRM.
	Excellent organizational and documentation skills, with attention to detail.
	Strong communication skills to support customers and internal teams across multiple channels (email, phone, chat).
	Ability to work collaboratively with sales, operations, and technical teams to optimize Zoho-based workflow

N150,000 / Month.

Sales & Operations Executive Job at Amani Advisory Limited




        
    

        
        Amani Advisory Limited is committed to assisting organizations in achieving success by maximizing their most valuable resource - their employees. We offer complete HR solutions to businesses of all sizes and in various industries. Thanks to a team of seasoned HR professionals, we approach every project with expertise, innovation, and a client-centric mindset.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales & Operations Executive

Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role
     

            
    




	The Sales & Operations executive provides administrative, analytical, and operational support to the sales and operations department.
	This role is essential in driving sales e?ciency, managing business operations, project management, ensuring smooth order processing, supporting customer engagement, customer service, vendor management and contributing to business growth through data analysis and cross-functional collaboration.


Key Responsibilities


	Identifying potential leads, researching prospects, and assisting with lead generation activities.
	Assist with the preparation and delivery of sales presentations, proposals, and contracts.
	Collaborate with the operations team to ensure e?cient order processing by sending quotes/invoices and fulfillment of customer orders.
	Help analyze sales data and market trends to identify opportunities for business growth and improvement.
	Provide administrative support, including maintaining sales and customer databases, organizing documents, and scheduling meetings.
	Assist in the development and implementation of sales and marketing strategies to promote our products or services.
	Support customer inquiries and provide exceptional customer service through various communication channels.
	Work closely with cross-functional teams to streamline processes and improve overall operational e?ciency.
	Participate in team meetings, training sessions, and other company events to enhance your professional development and understanding of our business operations
	Manage vendor/partner relationships.
	Undertake ad-hoc projects and assignments as assigned.


Qualifications and Skills


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Information Systems, or a related field with 2-3 years experience.
	Prior experience in a sales support, operations, CRM, or customer success role is an advantage.
	Familiarity with Zoho applications and Pricing such as Zoho CRM, Zoho Books, or Zoho Campaigns is highly desirable.
	Strong understanding of CRM processes, sales pipelines, and customer lifecycle management.
	Ability to generate, update, and manage leads, contacts, deals, and reports within Zoho CRM.
	Excellent organizational and documentation skills, with attention to detail.
	Strong communication skills to support customers and internal teams across multiple channels (email, phone, chat).
	Ability to work collaboratively with sales, operations, and technical teams to optimize Zoho-based workflow


Salary
N150,000 / Month.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV to: talent@amaniadvisory.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Content Creator Job at Dews and Petals Limited




        
    

        
        Dews and Petals is a premium pest control and cleaning company operating in Abuja, Nigeria. Renowned for delivering expert pest management services, Dews and Petals is committed to creating healthier, pest-free environmentsthrough education and tailored solutions. With a strong reputation for excellence, Dews and Petals provides reliable and effective pest control solutions for residential and commercial properties.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Content Creator
Job Location: Gwarimpa, Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Part-time

Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Develop engaging blog posts, articles, and website content on pest control topics.
	Manage and schedule social media content for Facebook, Instagram, and TikTok.
	Optimize content for SEO, researching and incorporating relevant keywords.
	Design graphics and short videos for digital marketing campaigns.
	Simplify technical pest control concepts for customer education.
	Collaborate with technicians, sales, and customer service teams for content accuracy.
	Analyze content performance using tools like Google Analytics and adjust strategies accordingly.


Qualifications & Requirements


	Minimum of 3 years of experience in content creation, social media management, or digital marketing.
	Strong writing and editing skills with the ability to engage different audiences.
	Knowledge of SEO, keyword research, and performance tracking tools.
	Basic proficiency in graphic design (Canva, Adobe Suite) and video editing.
	Creative mindset with attention to detail.
	Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects.
	Strong communication and teamwork skills.


Why Join Us?


	Competitive salary and benefits.
	Career growth and skill development opportunities.
	Supportive and dynamic work environment.
	Creative freedom to shape digital marketing strategies.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV, portfolio, and a sample content piece (blog post, social media post, or infographic) to to: hr.dewsng@gmail.com using “Content Creator Application – Location" as the subject of the email.
